title: Conduct Pre-Event Security Sweep
description: Before opening the doors for a high-profile event, the security team must conduct a full sweep of the venue.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the pre-event security sweep.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the task in the system.

tasks.description: Assign security teams to sweep different zones of the venue (e.g., seating bowl, concourses, backstage).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent divides the venue into zones and assigns teams to each.

tasks.description: Monitor the progress of each team as they report their zones are 'clear'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent tracks the completion of each zone sweep.

tasks.description: Once all zones are clear, give the 'all clear' to open the doors to the public.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives the final authorization to begin guest ingress.
